room_title: Escape room "Vampire's Lair" by Escape Room Palm Springs in Palm Springs
room_address: 2500 N. Palm Canyon Dr., #B3, Palm Springs, CA 92262
room_description: In Salem, Massachusetts in the late 1690s, a man and a woman fall in love. But shortly before the wedding, the man finds a magic spell in his fiancée’s handwriting - the spell was to make him fall in love with her by unnatural means. He rejects her and calls off the wedding, calling her an evil witch. “I will show you an evil witch!” she vows, and turns him into a vampire, but that isn’t all: he finds his coffin impossible to open!
